TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TextMarkerProperties extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an abstract class for defining text markers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A text marker is a symbol that is commonly used for creating distinctive visual elements, such as the bullets and auto-numbering for a list of items. The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSimpleMarkerProperties> object provides functionality for creating a text marker that is used for bullets and auto-numbering.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the distance from the start of the line to the end of the text marker symbol.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the offset of the marker symbol from the beginning of the line.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the offset of the marker symbol from the beginning of the line.
